title: Wonderful beautiful hotel - Review
text: We are in Beijing in this beautiful design hotel and we just love it!!! The room is absolutly confortable and very beautiful,service excelent,a wonderful lobby full of original art work,amazing architectural and all the luxury amenities you could imagine!!! The staff is very nice and very helpfull like Mr Chris who did everything to please you. The breakfast is very good ,and they serve afternoon tea and had a candie box,delicious!!!! I trully recommend it,the location is also very good and is inside a shopping mall very,very nice!!!!
